                                                                           ..............
                                                                         .....:::::..........          Welcome to Amp
                                                                       ....:::::::::::..........
                                                                      ....::::----::::::::.......
                                                                     ...::::---------:::::::::.....    Ctrl+O to execute commands
                                                                    ...::::------------:::::::::...    Type @ to mention files
                                                                   ....::----=======-----::::::::...   Ctrl+C to exit
                                                                   ...:::---==========-----::::::...
                                                                   ...::---====++++====-----:::::...
                                                                   ...::--====++++++====----:::::..    Use the amp: help command for more information
                                                                    ..::---===++++++====----::::...
                                                                    ..:::--====+++++====----:::...
                                                                     ..:::---==========---::::..       Smart mode now uses Gemini 3 Pro.
                                                                       ..:::----===-----::::...
                                                                         ...::::----:::::...
